tool.name: Create peptide table
tool.command:
msspeptable psm2pep -i '$psmtable' -o initial_peptidetable.txt --scorecolpattern '$scorecol' #if $fncol --spectracol $fncol #end if #if $isoquant.yesno.value == "true" --isobquantcolpattern '$isoquant.isobpatternstrip' #end if #if $precurqcolpattern --ms1quantcolpattern '$precurqcolpattern' #end if
&& paste <(cut -f 12 initial_peptidetable.txt) <(cut -f1-11,13-200 initial_peptidetable.txt) > peptidetable.txt
#if $isoquant.yesno.value == "true" && msspsmtable isoratio -i '$psmtable' -o isoquant.txt --targettable peptidetable.txt --protcol $isoquant.accessioncol --isobquantcolpattern '$isoquant.isobpatternratio' --minint '$isoquant.minint' --denompatterns #for $sampleset in $isoquant.setdenoms #if not $sampleset.setpattern or str($sampleset.setpattern) in $psmtable.element_identifier $sampleset.denompatterns #break #end if #end for #if $isoquant.normalize.type != "false" --normalize median #if $isoquant.normalize.type == "medianother" --norm-ratios '$isoquant.normalize.norm_ratio_table' #end if #end if && mv isoquant.txt peptidetable.txt #end if && mv peptidetable.txt '$output'

param.name: psmtable
param.label: PSM table
param.help: Must contain isobaric ratios and accession of protein/gene/peptide

param.name: fncol
param.label: Column number containing spectra file name

param.name: scorecol
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify score column

param.name: precurqcolpattern
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify precursor quant columns

param.name: isobpatternstrip
param.label: Broad pattern for stripping isobaric quant columns from PSM table before generating ratios
param.help: Regex to find quant columns, e.g. tmt10plex, itraq8plex, plex

param.name: isobpatternratio
param.label: Narrower pattern for finding isobaric quant columns in PSM table to generate ratios
param.help: Regex to find quant columns, e.g. ^tmt10plex, ^itraq8plex

param.name: setpattern
param.label: Sample set name for denominator
param.help: If no different sample sets are used, leave blank

param.name: denompatterns
param.label: Patterns for denominator isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Multiple are separated with space, e.g. ^tmt10plex_126 ^tmt10plex_127N.

param.name: accessioncol
param.label: Accession column number in PSM table containing the peptides to quantify

param.name: minint
param.label: Minimum intensity of PSM channel to include

param.name: type
param.label: Use isobaric data?
param.option: Median center using ratios from other table

param.name: norm_ratio_table
param.label: Tabular datatable with ratios
param.help: Same isobaric quant columns should occur

tool.help: Creates a peptide table from PSM table. It is optional to add isobaric quant, precursor quant, probabilities.
